title: ==Dominating Top Lane Champions With Good Poke And Burst==
body:
Please tell me in the comments which is the best top lane champion out there now as I really like to try top lane.

Thanks {{champion:266}}

replies.body:
hecarim. poke and destroys all melee tops.
has good burst with tele homeguard as well as triforce and e.

Pretty much this. I'm playing only Hec at the moment and have been surprised at how easy the match ups are so far. Only lost lane once and that game everyone lost lane so I don't feel so bad.

On the flip side, Rumble goes well against Hec and has amazing zoning potential in his own right so I  there's 2 to get you started. They're both very fun/rewarding champs too which is why I personally like them.
